summary: This document is a CIA information report regarding a white paper being prepared by Gene Gregory of the Times of Vietnam at the request of Madame Ngo Dinh Nhu. The white paper sets forth the Government of Vietnam's position on the Buddhist issue, American presence and policy in South Vietnam.
title: CIA Information Report
recipient: STATE/INR DIA ARMY/ACSI NAVY AIR JCS SECDEF NIC NSA AID USIA OCI ONE OCR ORR 081 00 STATE/DIR
